title: The Floor is yours (TEFC)
creator_credit: Richard Need, Management Training Ltd and Richard Need Productions
brief_description: A case study which tells the story of a young manager about to give his first business presentation and how he is saved from panic by help from an unexpected source. He discovers that good preparation is more than half the battle in successful communication and learns a tried and tested method that will see him through every kind of public speaking occasion.
